subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Ronny Paulino’s bases-loaded double highlighted the Pittsburgh Pirates’ biggest rally in nearly three years, an eight-run splurge in the 10th that set up a 10-4 victory against the host Cincinnati Reds last night.
snippet: Ronny Paulino’s bases-loaded double highlighted the Pittsburgh Pirates’ biggest rally in nearly three years, an eight-run splurge in the 10th that set up a 10-4 victory against the host Cincinnati Reds last night.
